title: Epic Games starts another fight with Google, this time over Bandcamp
content:
Epic Games has spent the past few years in lawsuits and appeals with Apple and Google, after the company tried to work around the revenue cuts that the App Store and Google Play Store take from in-app purchases. The ongoing legal action has primarily been about Fortnite, which is still absent from both stores, but

The post Epic Games starts another fight with Google, this time over Bandcamp appeared first on XDA.
description: Epic Games, new owner of Bandcamp, has filed legal action against Google to avoid giving the Play Store a cut of Bandcamp revenue.
